titleInfo.title: A Multilinear Model for Bidirectional Craniofacial Reconstruction (Data)

mods.abstract:
We provide - an application that demonstrates how to load and evaluate a multilinear model for different skull shape and FSTT distribution parameters and thereby generating meshes for skull and skin surface (see mlm_demo.zip) - the training data used to generate our multilinear models (see mlm_trainingdata.zip) - multilinear models with different complexity (see mlm_models.zip)
For a quick start, please have a look at the demo application.
